hero.title: Master Every Search
hero.subtitle: AI-powered search intelligence that finds exactly what you need, when you need it.

features.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
features.description: Advanced algorithms understand context and intent, delivering results that matter.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Get results in milliseconds. Our optimized infrastructure ensures instant responses.

features.title: Smart Filters
features.description: Refine searches with intelligent filters that learn from your behavior.

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Search across multiple data sources simultaneously with unified results.

features.title: Export & Share
features.description: Save and share search results with your team in multiple formats.

features.title: Secure & Private
features.description: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption for all searches.

testimonials.quote: MasterSearch transformed how our team finds information. It's like having a research assistant that never sleeps.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: The AI insights are incredible. We're finding connections in data we never knew existed.
testimonials.author: Michael Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: Cut our research time by 70%. Best investment we've made this year.
testimonials.author: Emma Thompson

metaDescription: Transform your search experience with AI-powered intelligence. Find exactly what you need with MasterSearch's advanced algorithms and lightning-fast results.
